text: Kim Jin-yi is a South Korean actress and model. She made her debut in the 1990s. She is known for her roles in dramas such as Reset, Cheo Yong and Love in the Moonlight. ==Personal life== She and Oh Hee-joong, who is also an actor, are married. They both married at Seoul in 2017. ==Filmography== ===Television series=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Year !! Title!! Role!!
